reviews.course_name: Masterpieces of Western Literature and Philosophy (Literature Humanities)
reviews.review_content:
One fo the wittiest professors I've ever met. He's young and is not too old. Additionally, he has an excellant sense of humor, and hates class. He does not have a teaching/lecturing environment. It is more of a, friendly discussion, upper West side talk on a bunch of dead Greeks.
Workload:
Easy
